Articles.Content: What is it? I joined the forum back in July 2014 (yeah, this july) and I heard about tons of stuff about this "April Forum Disaster". What is it?

The big April Krash was a nasty forum software failure.

Several things went wrong and it went from bad to worse. Only option was to roll the forum back several months to a back-up that wasn't corrupted. Hundreds of accounts and thousands of post were lost in the process.

Ah... I see. I've also heard about similar things happening before? I can't remember the name of what happened, but some guy had something else that had "Forum Disaster" thing on there. It wasn't the April Krash.

You might also notice that an awful lot of accounts have a join date in April 2013. Many of these users are people who had their old accounts lost in the forum disaster and created new ones afterwards.
